description: Arbitrary person-level identifier used to link across tables.
Cause of death code. Please include the decimal point in ICD codes (if any).

value_description: C=Contributory I=Immediate/Primary O=Other U=Underlying NI=No information UN=Unknown OT=Other
description: Cause of death type. There should be only one underlying cause of death.

value_description: L=Other, locally defined; N=National Death Index; D=Social Security; S=State Death files; T=Tumor data; DR=Derived; NI=No information; UN=Unknown; OT=Other
description: Source of cause of death information. Guidance: “Other, locally defined” may be used to indicate presence of deaths reported from EHR systems, such as inpatient hospital deaths or dead on arrival.

value_description: E=Excellent F=Fair P=Poor NI=No information UN=Unknown OT=Other
description: Confidence in the accuracy of the cause of death based on source, match, number of reporting sources, discrepancies, etc.
